body:
### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
spack install extrae
```

### Information on your system

* **Spack:** 0.17.0-1-f02dec2bbb
* **Python:** 3.9.7
* **Platform:** linux-ubuntu21.10-skylake
* **Concretizer:** clingo


### Additional information

build-out and build-env text files:
[spack-build-env.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/7949729/spack-build-env.txt)
[spack-build-out.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/7949730/spack-build-out.txt)

compiling fails with:
```console
  >> 1523    /usr/bin/ld: /home/primrose/installed/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu21.10-skylake/gcc-11.2.0/openmpi-4.1.1-h3touzufbjutl63bxdpwwlxs4ccepnpl/lib/libmpi.so: undefined refer
             ence to `mca_common_sm_fini'
  >> 1524    /usr/bin/ld: /home/primrose/installed/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu21.10-skylake/gcc-11.2.0/openmpi-4.1.1-h3touzufbjutl63bxdpwwlxs4ccepnpl/lib/libmpi.so: undefined refer
             ence to `mca_common_sm_module_create_and_attach'
  >> 1525    /usr/bin/ld: /home/primrose/installed/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu21.10-skylake/gcc-11.2.0/openmpi-4.1.1-h3touzufbjutl63bxdpwwlxs4ccepnpl/lib/libmpi.so: undefined refer
             ence to `mca_common_sm_module_attach'
  >> 1526    collect2: error: ld returned 1 exit status

```

full output is here:
[stdout.txt (output of the command)](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/7949732/stdout.txt)




### General information

- [X] I have run `spack debug report` and reported the version of Spack/Python/Platform
- [X] I have run `spack maintainers <name-of-the-package>` and **@mentioned** any maintainers
- [X] I have uploaded the build log and environment files
- [X] I have searched the issues of this repo and believe this is not a duplicate
title: Installation issue: extrae 3.8.3
